lines.text: Do you think you could sneak up on the fella at the gate?
I could sneak up on a *coyote* if I've a mind to!
Did you get that fella at the gate?
He's at *another* gate now, lookin' fer *Saint Peter*!
Turn around Sherriff, I want you to see who kills you!

[to Ketcham]
You mess this up, Sergeant Major, and you won't live to *know it*!
You're gonna be the *first* to die!
Ketcham, we promised you in a trade. But we didn't say what *condition* you'd be in!
I should've taken you this morning!
You should'a *tried*!
Mr. Phillips; you watch Ketchum while we go inside.
Sure thing, Colonel. If you hear a loud noise, it'll be Mr. Ketchum dyin'.
[Phillips is irritating everyone by playing a jaw harp]
Dammit, Mr. Phillips! Don't you know any other songs?
I don't know this one. That's why I keep practicin'.
[McNally and the others open bottles of beer]
Don't I get a beer?
Not as long as you're playin' that harp.
I'll put it up!
[Phillips throws harp in the trash can]
What about Ketchum? He don't get no beer, does he?
[Shasta wakes up in Cordona's bed after fainting]
What am I doing here?
Well, you fainted after you shot Whitey, so we put you to bed.
Wait a minute! Where are my clothes? Which one of you took my clothes?
I did.
Why?
Well, we flipped a coin and I won!
Where are your pants.
You're sleeping on them.
Whitey's *dead*.

[delighted]
*That's* the best news I heared all *year*! Who killed 'im?

[referring to Shasta]
*She* did!

[amazed]
Well, I'll be a suck-egg mule-! Legs like *that*, and she can *shoot*, too!
You got your town back.

[after McNaly slugs a bad guy from behind]
Well you certainly *took* long enough! I was running out of things to *say*!
*That*, I *can't* believe!
I'm Cord McNally. Didn't Tuscarora tell you about me?
Cord McNally? Yeah, he sure did! And I ain't gonna *repeat* what he said!
[Col. McNally provides Sgt. Tuscarora Phillips with money to return home]

[delighted]
Colonel suh, I never thought I'd feel like kissin' a *Yankee!*
Don't you worry Mr. Ketcham, we'll get you out.
Just try and get him out, just you try!
Don't try anything Tom, don't do anything, he's crazy, he want's to kill me!
He's right!
[Fires shotgun in the air, then jabs it into Ketchams back]
Got another barrel, get in there!
I've been called a lot of things, but not "comfortable"!
[Col. McNally visits with Capt. Cordona and Sgt. Phillips after the war ends]
I'm glad *you two* weathered the storm.
Well, it's a simple life- No wine, no women, no song.
And no *whiskey*!
Well, *I* can remedy *that*; If you two don't mind drinkin' with a "Bluebelly".
Colonel Suh, I'd drink with *The Devil Himself*!
*I* feel just like *he* does!

[smiles]
We're *headed* in the right direction!
Take a look at this, Ketcham-
[close-up of Phillips' shotgun]
-those triggers are *wired back*! So you can see what happens if my *thumbs* slip; And my thumbs *ain't* as strong as they *used* to be!
Oww, take it easy.
Stop your squawking, you ain't hurt.
Splatter gun is useless.
You don't mind if I shoot do you? Makes me feel better.
Mr, UH?
Doesn't matter
Well, Mr Doesn't matter we ought to give them one last good yell, they usually yell a lot when I give them a shot of this
YOW! That's the real stuff!
Well, if you had been a good enough actor I wouldn't have used it!
Cord McNally

[after being shot in the leg in front of the saloon]
Owww!
